MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Please see the official release notes for more details.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: A64 or later CPU, 512MB RAM, 150 MB HDD space

English.Keywords: browser, x64, 64-bit, custom, web, internet, mozilla, pale, moon, palemoon, firefox, windows
English.Char_Desc_250: Pale Moon is an Open Source, Mozilla-derived browser focusing on user customization, efficiency an ease of use.
English.Char_Desc_450: Pale Moon is an Open Source, Mozilla-derived web browser focusing on user customization, efficiency an ease of use. Pale Moon offers you a browsing experience in a browser completely built from its own source with carefully selected features and optimizations to maximize the browser's speed, stability and user experience, while maintaining compatibility with many Firefox extensions you have come to love and rely on.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Pale Moon is an Open Source, Mozilla-derived web browser focusing on user customization, efficiency and ease of use. Make sure to get the most out of your browser!
Pale Moon offers you a browsing experience in a Goanna-based browser completely built from its own source with carefully selected features and optimizations to maximize the browser's speed, stability and user experience, while maintaining compatibility with many Firefox extensions you have come to love and rely on.
Pale Moon is a middle road, cutting away support for (by current standards) ancient systems to give you a browser that not only supports the wide variety of uses the Mozilla software offers, but also uses the capabilities of modern hardware to give you a fast, efficient browser. Using Pale Moon, you will have full freedom to customize the browser the way you want it, as user choice is one of the important goals of this browser.

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions:
The binaries are distributed as freeware, and may only be redistributed as-is and according to the redistribution license, the latest version of which can be found at:
http://www.palemoon.org/redist.shtml
Permissions.EULA: This program is supplied AS-IS and without any warranty. By using this program, you indicate that you understand that the browser's developer(s) cannot be held liable for any damages or loss of time or profit as a result of the use of this free product.
